Uses of Class
edu.harvard.cs262.Exceptions.NotMasterException

  • Packages that use NotMasterException 
    Package Description
    edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer  
    edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer  

    • Uses of NotMasterException in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer

      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer that throw NotMasterException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameSnapshot GameServer.getSnapshot()
      This method is called so that someone, usually the client, can get a surface-level of the game for the user to view.
      GameSnapshot GameServer.sendCommand(GameCommand command)
      This method is used by a client to ask this server to execute a command in the game.

    • Uses of NotMasterException in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer

      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer that throw NotMasterException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameSnapshot GameClusterServer.getSnapshot()
      If this is the master, it should have the most up-to-date information on the state of the game.
      GameSnapshot GameClusterServer.sendCommand(GameCommand command)
      When the client wants to play a move on the game, it calls the sendCommand method on the master.
